=== Brown Screen of Death ===

If you are left on a brown screen after logging, you maybe encountering the UbuntuDateBug.

=== Freeze at log in screen ===

Ubuntu boot to log in screen, but you are unable to type username and password.

This is likely to be a graphics driver problem. There are some specific systems this is common on.
* Macs using ATI Rage 128 (CRT iMacs, some G3 iBooks and PowerBooks) http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=501386&postcount=4
